name: Physical Therapy
description: Physical therapists are movement experts who improve quality of life through prescribed exercise, hands-on care, and patient education

name: Chiropractic Therapy
description: Chiropractors are trained to recommend exercises to treat and rehabilitate health conditions related to the bones, muscles.

name: Massage Therapy
description: Massage therapy is the scientific manipulation of the soft tissues of the body for the purpose of normalizing those tissues and consists .

name: Sport Injury
description: Sports injuries are injuries that occur when engaging in sports or exercise. Sports injuries can occur due to overtraining, lack of conditioning.

name: Physio Therapy
description: Physiotherapists help people affected by injury, illness or disability through movement and exercise gym therapy.

name: Manual Therapy
description: Manual therapy is a specialized physical therapy method that utilizes specific, hands-on techniques without the assistance of devices.
